title: Health-Tech Startups Jump Into the Covid-19 Vaccine Rollout
sub_head: Companies are creating platforms to efficiently shepherd those eligible through the vaccination process, as well as tracking vaccine supplies and even running vaccination sites
body:
Government and health-care groups are enlisting health-tech startups in the effort to clear critical last-mile hurdles to rolling out Covid-19 vaccines.
Urgency to distribute the vaccines is mounting along with the threat of new and more-contagious strains of the coronavirus. The rollout of vaccines has gone slowly, as officials contend with limited vaccine supplies and logistical and technology difficulties in quickly bringing in eligible people to be inoculated.
